result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sylvia C. RICHMOND

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
The State moves to dismiss and read in all counts.  The defendant plead to a charge of theft in 14 CM 108 and a charge of felony bail jumping in 14 CF 67.  The Court orders the $500.00 cash bail on this case be transferred to 14 CM 108 and held on that case until the time of sentencing.
Minutes.
Plea date is reset to 05-19-14 at 9:00 a.m.
Status conference is set for 03-31-14 at 11:15 a.m.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is reset to 03-27-14 at 11:00 a.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Sylvia C. RICHMOND
Current: 556 Jackson Street, Mishicot, WI 54228 United States  (Effective: 02-20-2014)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Mishicot, WI 54228
At 12:15 p.m., $200.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives her right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty pleas entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 02-27-14 at 2:30 p.m.
MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
Parties argue.  Court denies the motion.
State to draft order.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 02-12-14 at 2:00 p.m.  
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of issue worthless checks, obstruct officer and two counts bail jumping.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 02-03-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $200.00 cash with the condition that she she report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release.   Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued. Copy filed.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
